title: Even as Omicron Cases Rise in U.K., Johnson Faces Mutiny Over New Rules
content:
1. Even as Omicron Cases Rise in U.K., Johnson Faces Mutiny Over New Rules  The New York Times
  2. LIVE: UK lawmakers debate and vote on 'Plan B' Covid restrictions  Reuters
  3. Covid: PM faces big rebellion as MPs vote on new restrictions  BBC News
  4. The Guardian view on Boris Johnson: pandemic authority draining away  The Guardian
  5. If no one listens to Johnson over Omicron, that’s his fault. But listen to him we must  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
